questions.question: Which of the following is a characteristic property of carbon?
options: It is a gas at room temperature
It is highly reactive with water

options: They contain a carbon-carbon double bond

options: It is less dense than air
It is produced by complete combustion

options: They contain at least one carbon-carbon double bond

options: They have a high boiling point
